Structs/SourceLocation.html#/s:9Debuggin.name: column
Structs/SourceLocation.html#/s:9Debuggin.abstract: Number of characters into the line this location starts at.

Structs/SourceLocation.html#/s:9Debuggin.name: capture(file:function:line:column:range:)
Structs/SourceLocation.html#/s:9Debuggin.abstract: Creates a new SourceLocation for the current call site.

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: readableName
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: A readable name for the error’s Type. This is usually

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: typeIdentifier
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: A unique identifier for the error’s Type.

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: identifier
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: Some unique identifier for this specific error.

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: reason
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: The reason for the error. Usually one sentence (that should end with a period).

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: sourceLocation
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: Optional source location for this error

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: stackTrace
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: Stack trace from which this error originated (must set this from the error’s init)

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: possibleCauses
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: A String array describing the possible causes of the error.

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: suggestedFixes
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: A String array listing some common fixes for the error.

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: documentationLinks
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: An array of string URLs linking to documentation pertaining to the error.

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: stackOverflowQuestions
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: An array of string URLs linking to related Stack Overflow questions.

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: gitHubIssues
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: An array of string URLs linking to related issues on Vapor’s GitHub repo.

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: makeStackTrace()
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: Generates a stack trace from the call point. Must call this from the error’s init.

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: fullIdentifier
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: Undocumented

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: debugDescription
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: See CustomDebugStringConvertible

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: description
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: See CustomStringConvertible

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: errorDescription
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: A localized message describing what error occurred.

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: failureReason
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: A localized message describing the reason for the failure.

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: recoverySuggestion
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: A localized message describing how one might recover from the failure.

Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.name: helpAnchor
Protocols/Debuggable.html#/s:9Debugging1.abstract: A localized message providing help text if the user requests help.
